item.title: Dozens feared trapped after cloudburst triggers flash floods in India state
item.description: Rescue teams are en route to Dharali village in Uttarkashi district, which is believed to have borne the brunt of the floods.

item.title: Protests in China over viral school bullying case
item.description: One protester in Sichuan province said “things got bloody” after police used batons and electric prods.

item.title: Watch: Fireworks ignite as blaze hits Japanese festival launch boats
item.description: Launch barges at a fireworks festival in Japan's city Yokohama caught fire after pyrotechnics landed on them.

item.title: Watch: Fireworks ignite as blaze hits Japanese festival launch boats
item.description: Launch barges at a fireworks festival in Japan's city Yokohama caught fire after pyrotechnics landed on them.

item.title: Texas Republicans vote to arrest Democrats blocking plan to re-draw electoral boundaries
item.description: The Democrats facing arrest have fled to block a vote that could sway the balance of power in Washington.
